personalInfo.name: Khawaja Zeeshan
personalInfo.title: Web Developer
personalInfo.careerObjective: Motivated and passionate Computer Science graduate with a strong foundation in web development and programming. Eager to apply technical skills and gain real-world experience through internships or junior-level opportunities. Committed to continuous learning and contributing to innovative projects in a professional environment.
bio: A MERN Stack Developer dedicated to building modern, high-performance, and user-centric web applications.
I hold a BS in Computer Science from the University of Azad Jammu and Kashmir, where I built a strong foundation in web technologies, UI/UX design, and real-time development.
My work combines technology and creativity — crafting elegant, functional, and meaningful digital experiences.

experience: Frontend Developer — React, Tailwind, UI Design
softSkills: Effective Communication – Able to clearly express ideas and collaborate within teams
Time Management – Skilled in prioritizing tasks and meeting deadlines efficiently
Problem Solving – Able to troubleshoot issues and find practical solutions
Adaptability – Quick to learn and adjust to new tools, technologies, and environments

projects.title: Final Year Project (Revamping of UAJK Portal Empowered with AI Chatbot)
projects.description: Developed a modern university portal using MERN stack with modules for students, faculty, and admin management. Integrated an AI Chatbot for real-time query assistance. Added features like notices, virtual campus tour, results, and course info to enhance user interaction and accessibility.

projects.title: E-commerce Website (MERN Stack)
projects.description: Built a full-featured e-commerce platform with user authentication, product creation, cart functionality, and payment system using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js.

projects.title: Spotify App
projects.description: Created a music player using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that supports playing, pausing, skipping, and switching songs.

projects.title: News App (Python)
projects.description: Python-based application that fetches and displays local news using the user's geographic location.

projects.title: To-Do List App
projects.description: A task manager that allows users to add, update, check off, and delete tasks with a clean UI and persistent storage.

projects.title: File Organizer by Extension
projects.description: Node.js script that organizes files in folders based on their extensions, making system management efficient and automated.
